mapper.sql: WITH LST AS ( SELECT A.* , ROW_NUMBER() OVER () RNUM FROM (
mapper.select: /* selectSvcCode */ SELECT S1.SVC_ID, S1.SVC_NM, S1.APP_ID FROM TB_SVC S1 ,TB_SVC_AUTH S2,TB_MOB_SVC S3, TB_SYS_USER_AUTH_GRP S4 WHERE S1.SVC_ID = S2.SVC_ID AND S1.SVC_ID = S3.SVC_ID AND NVL(S3.USE_YN ,'N') = 'Y' AND S2.AUTH_GRP_ID=S4.AUTH_GRP_ID AND USER_ID= #{S_ID_USER}
/* selectSvcId */ SELECT A.SVC_ID , A.SVC_NM FROM TB_SVC A INNER JOIN TB_STO_SVC B ON A.SVC_ID = B.SVC_ID WHERE B.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY SVC_NM
